website_summaries.verdict: With short and long runs in mind, the Asics Gel Contend 6  is equipped with the features and technologies that suit every runner's needs. Dubbed as one of the comfortable, supportive, and affordable running shoes, the Gel contend 6 will surely make the majority of the users happy and satisfied.
pros: Some of the users said that the Asics Gel Contend 6 is comfortable to wear
It is breathable, as noted by a purchaser
Many testers loved its affordable price
According to those who have bought it, the running shoe has an excellent grip
Several reviewers commented that the shoe is supportive
The majority of the consumers agreed that the running footwear is durable
A few buyers observed that the shoe provides a perfect fit
It is stylish, most wearers mentioned
cons: One of the consumers said that the Asics Gel Contend 6 did not help to heal his issue with Plantar Fasciitis
He still needs t put insole inserts
A user mentioned that he has no plan of wearing the running shoe in the winter season
The shoe feels cold, so its best to use it during summer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Asics shoes I find they fit my feet well and these are no exception. I have run about 10 times in the so far and done some HIIT work and they are standing up well: no rubbing, nice support and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Murf

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for everyday use but hard on the feet for longer runs.
customer_reviews.text: These feel really comfortable for short runs and everyday use. However they feel harder than previous models and I am having pains in my ankles and toes following longer runs. If you are looking to run over 10 miles I would pay extra and get the nimbus or an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: louisa

customer_reviews.title: used Asics a few years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Now started jogging again, I have been using other trainers. First run back in Asics was totally different. A much better experience. less leg fatique and more miles. I am thinking of buying a spare pair.
customer_reviews.author: bga146

customer_reviews.title: Conversion charts needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked fabulous and exactly as you’d expect from images supplied and arrived prior to notice but sadly the drop down menu for ordering online was in U.K. sizes only and what arrived was only listed in US and EU measurements. Neither correlated to what is ordered and as a result the shoe was a whole size too big. The company was great at returning and refunding. Very disappointed overall considering conversion charts are so easily available.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to take up a bit of light running; they fit perfectly and are very comfortable. They look good too. So far they have twice transported me round the neighbouring streets and parks without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: E M Rae

customer_reviews.title: Made me feel and look like a runner
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes for the money, only been running a few months, started with old pair of trail shoes, bought these feel like I’m running on air , made me feel like a proper runner
customer_reviews.author: Mr Thomas McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed Purchased these shoes just over a month ago already very worn on the right foot there is severe wear to the trainers would like to return very difficult to return once past 30 days please can you help
customer_reviews.author: bilquis aslam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable trainers at a good price. If anything they are a bit winger fit than normal.
customer_reviews.author: David A Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First pair of trainers I’ve owned in 30 years - vetry comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Robin B

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfy and nice to run in. My first of running shoes for the sole purpose and seem good for the money. Better than my usual £30 ones from a high street retailer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits well and is nice to run in. However, it took 29 days to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bargain shoes, why pay more!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes and great value. Could be a little wider to be a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had these trainers since the 8th june just over two months. I do not use them for running just for walks. Look at the toes of both shoes, they are breaking into a hole. This design for me does not work. Not worthwhile returning as they would probably not give me a refund. So be aware if you are thinking of buying this style.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable trainers I’ve owned, thought I might have to wear them in for a couple of outings but no, when I first put them on I knew straight away that these were different, went out for a run, only 8k but they felt great, size wise, I normally take a 9, I ordered a 9 and I’m glad I did, perfect fit and very comfy indeed, will see how they go as far as durability is concerned but for the price they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price, great service
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, arrived as advertised and a great beginners running shoe at a great price. Very happy all round and will probably replace them with the same if still available.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: My previous ASICS shoes had served me well for almost 10 years (I don't run, but walk significant distances and use them for holiday golf) so I decided to stick to the brand/style. They were comfortable from the moment I put them on and I've already had a few months of satisfactory wear. Too early to comment on durability, but they appear well made and certainly haven't shown any signs of undue wear over a couple of hundred miles of walking this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Reg Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great value runners
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Too early to tell properly, only done 3 runs in them so I’m still just breaking them in. Nice and light and breathable but they are definitely bigger than normal sizing by 1/2 size so order them smaller than you usually need.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these runners. I find them nice for walking and are very comfortable .Normally take a 8uk but got 8.5uk for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Marsbub

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous shoes. Were delivered very quickly despite the long estimated delivery time that was quoted on purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma, County Durham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed, I asked for size 9 and they send me size 10. The shoes are nice and good for the price but too big and I had to back the item loosing the delivery cost because their error.
customer_reviews.author: Kikhi85

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed running shoes, and these came out best for value for money, and I have to say they have not let me down, comfortable, lightweight, perfect fit. I'm only a recreational runner (keeping fit) and they certainly fit the bill at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value runners
customer_reviews.text: Worn these a lot since buying and they have stood up to gym and running (and I am heavy). Really comfy and good value for money. Fit well.
customer_reviews.author: steven travers

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other asics shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good looking as other asics shoes I used in the past and doesn't quite fit right.
customer_reviews.author: semira

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy these after a running enthusiast friend recommended them. I'm really liking them so far. Very comfortable and supportive. And really stylish too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr JM Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great product but slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good looking lightweight running shoes. Appreciate current difficult climate but still disappointed that it took 11 days to receive. Other Amazon orders on marketplace still arriving within 1 or 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: They came as a pair!
customer_reviews.text: Do the job I expected them to do. Good price and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Fair but true

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer, very comfortable, doesn’t really feel like your wearing a trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris lees

customer_reviews.title: New trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well and realised how badly I needed a new pair of trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Good to begin with. Six months and 200 miles later holes worn through near big toes, plastic on heels worn away and heel padding seems crushed. Expected better wear resistance ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Stardelta

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: second pair of Asics I bought. None last more than 2-3 months before having some fault.
customer_reviews.author: cs123

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Contend 6 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Reach new milestones with the Asics contend 6 running shoe. Created to provide the stability needed To hold up to the end, this shoe offers support for donning, thanks to the inner heel shell. A removable insole, The gel in the heel area and the amplifoam midsole are the features that ensure comfort and cushioning at every step. The solid rubber sole and the reinforced toe ensure a long life, while the breathable athletic net keeps the foot cool for longer so you can take on new challenges. Proudly showing our classic logo on the sides, you can rest assured that contend 6 gives you comfort and protection when you need it most.
feature_bullets: Comfort and cushioning at every step
